content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: repeater
inventory=[{"type": "lantern", "quantity": 16, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 42, "index": 16}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 3, "index": 31}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "redstone_torch", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 3, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a repeater, I need to first craft redstone. I have 1 redstone_block at slot 36, so I will move that to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: repeater
inventory=[{"type": "redstone", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 16, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 42, "index": 16}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 3, "index": 31}, {"type": "redstone_torch", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 3, "index": 45}]
thought: I have crafted the redstone, and now need to move it from slot 0 to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9

TASK: Craft an item of type: repeater
inventory=[{"type": "redstone", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 16, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 42, "index": 16}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 3, "index": 31}, {"type": "redstone_torch", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 3, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I have the redstone, I can craft the repeater. I need to place 1 redstone_torch in the first slot, so I will move one of the 2 redstone_torch at slot 39 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: repeater
inventory=[{"type": "redstone_torch", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 16, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 42, "index": 16}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 3, "index": 31}, {"type": "redstone_torch", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 3, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I need to place 1 redstone to the right of the redstone_torch, so I will move one of the 9 redstone at slot 11 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: repeater
inventory=[{"type": "redstone_torch", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 8, "index": 11}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 16, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 42, "index": 16}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 3, "index": 31}, {"type": "redstone_torch", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 3, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I need to place 1 redstone_torch below the redstone, so I will move one of the 1 redstone_torch at slot 39 to slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: repeater
inventory=[{"type": "redstone_torch", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "redstone_torch", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 8, "index": 11}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 16, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 42, "index": 16}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 3, "index": 31}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 3, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I need to place 1 stone below the redstone_torch, so I will move one of the 3 stone at slot 45 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: repeater
inventory=[{"type": "redstone_torch", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "redstone_torch", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 8, "index": 11}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 16, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 42, "index": 16}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 3, "index": 31}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 2, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I need to place 1 stone to the right of the stone, so I will move one of the 2 stone at slot 45 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: repeater
inventory=[{"type": "redstone_torch", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "redstone_torch", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 8, "index": 11}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 16, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 42, "index": 16}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 3, "index": 31}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I need to place 1 stone below the stone, so I will move one of the 1 stone at slot 45 to slot 6.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 6 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: repeater
inventory=[{"type": "repeater", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "redstone_torch", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "redstone_torch", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 8, "index": 11}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 16, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 42, "index": 16}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 3, "index": 31}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I have crafted the repeater, I can move it from slot 0 to an empty inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
